name: TUI / LA
description:
TUI / LA is a simple, single-player sokoban game built around cooperation and lateral thinking. using two characters you separately control, puzzles are created around planning ahead to push and pull boxes onto circles.

with its bright, simple looks and phenomenal music by Patricia Taxxon, TUI / LA's brightly-colored surface hides a collection of uniquely difficult puzzles that challenge you to rethink how you approach interactivity in a digital world.

this is a completely free experience with no extra costs hidden inside. all puzzles are able to be unlocked and completed, and you have the ability to unlock them all from the get-go. use this experience to unwind, relax, and give yourself something fun to do for a short while.

CONTROLS:

wasd to move

v to switch characters

spacebar to pick up boxes

e to drop boxes

esc to pause game

z to undo previous moves

enjoy - lurien ♡
